remarks: Choice-free analogue of ~ itgabs .  (Contributed by Brendan Leahy, 19-Nov-2017.)  (Revised by Brendan Leahy, 19-Jun-2018.)
statement:
itgabsnc.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. V ) $.
itgabsnc.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> B ) e. L^1 ) $.
itgabsnc.m1 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> ( abs ` B ) ) e. MblFn ) $.
itgabsnc.m2 $e |- ( ph -> ( y e. A |-> ( ( * ` S. A B _d x ) x. [_ y / x ]_ B ) ) e. MblFn ) $.
itgabsnc $p |- ( ph -> ( abs ` S. A B _d x ) <_ S. A ( abs ` B ) _d x ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B y $.
$d V x y $.
$d ph x y $.
